answers.answer: It sounds like high blood pressure, I would call your dr or hospital asap to be checked out
If you're in your third trimester you might have preeclampsia. What you describe are symptoms of that. Call the doc asap. I've had it twice and it's nothing to play with. I hope you feel better.

i just had this was in hospital for dehydration....but there was other issues that came out in my ultrasound they were worried about preclampsia so get it looked into. i had some.cramps i went to sleep and woke to a migraine and puking....
Definitely signs of preeclampsia. Get checked out asap. Good luck mama!

I just had a check up 2 days ago and one again today and each have shown baby and me are ok. So im not sure if its a serious symptom or just tired or stress. It happened when my husband was leaving to go somewhere for the evening and i was going to stay with my 1 yr old. I had to call him to come back. Last night i was stressed and worried about my baby since i spotted a few times yesterday. Doctor checked me and saw i was fine and that it might be due to breastfeeding so i stopped the night breastfeeding last night. My 1 year old kept my husband and me awake all night. Very stressful. Woke up early to go to dr about spotting and then went to my 1 year olds dr appointment to get her 3 shots :( Then my inlaws came over for dinner. It has been a stressful day and im so exhausted. Im hoping thats just it. Because my blood pressure was fine and no protein in my urine. But if it doesn't happen again i will still mention it to my dr next week on my next appointment.  I was just wondering if it happened to anyone and it was no big deal.

Definitely call your Dr if they have an after hours number or nurse hotline. Some hospitals have a nurse hotline for their maternity departments too. Otherwise, head to the the ER if you are really concerned about it. None of us on here can tell you for sure what is going on. Better to be safe than sorry! Feel better soon!

This happened to me before I told my doctor and he didnt seem to worried about it he checked my urine and blood pressure and said it could be stress hormones or the baby sitting on a nerve not sure :(
Maybe it's margarine related or an anxiety attack?
My doctor always tells me if I suddenly get blurred vision and headache, DO NOT HESITATE to call or go in. I'm sure it could be serious

I've had it quite a few times now in this pregnancy and ive been to the hospital every time and every time they say everything is ok so even tho I do believe it's serious I'm also at the point where when it does happen I think do I really need to go up to be told the same bloody thing again but it's your baby do what you think is right hun.  I got told I'm doing too much (i have three under 4 aswell as this one on way) and that I'm always dehydrated .. If it was pre eclampsia which I had with my first then you would also have swollen hands and feet , protein in pee , high blood pressure and then the blurred vision and headaches but I'm sure you are fine hun xx

Oh forgot to add that a few times that it has happened I've been leaning on my right side which in turn makes baby lean against vein going to heart and not enough blood can get thru which does against couple of things like make you faint/dizzy and blurs your vision .. on one episode I couldn't see out of my left eye for a good hour so.blurry it was unreal couldn't see two feet in front of me... so its comforting to me to know it not the only one as.i hope I am to you x
@mumziemz Yes thank you so much for sharing! It is good to know I'm not the only one.
No preeclampsia:) came to ER ran some tests and doctor says it was a bad migraine that messed with my vision. Thanks ladies.
Thats good to hear! Take it easy mama :-)

question: anyone else experienced a sudden blurry vision and headache? For about 30 minutes one of my eyes could not focus. I felt like my vision came in and out. And then now i have a big headache even though ive drank water. I've had a VERY difficult day and this just is a horrible way to end such a day. I'm just thankful the blurred vision went away.
title: Sudden blurred vision
